description:
Cinnabar is an aloof jewel person who is even weaker than http://anidb.net/ch91046 [Phos], with a hardness of 2, but carries a powerful poison in their body. Because this poison taints the environment and erases memories stored inside affected jewel shards, Cinnabar is kept on night watch, but yearns to escape the night.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shinsha
